projects.title: Featured Projects
projects.description: Solutions focused on delivering real value and solving meaningful problems.

list.name: CSS-Tailwind Converter
list.tagline: Convert CSS to Tailwind CSS instantly
list.problem: Developers waste hours manually converting existing CSS codebases to Tailwind CSS, slowing down migration projects.
list.solution: An AI-powered tool that automatically converts CSS code to Tailwind CSS classes, maintaining design fidelity and reducing migration time by 80%.
list.impact: 500+ developers using it monthly, saving an average of 10 hours per project

list.name: CV Analyzer
list.problem: Job seekers struggle to optimize their resumes for ATS systems and specific job requirements, resulting in missed opportunities.
list.solution: An intelligent CV analysis tool that provides personalized feedback, keyword optimization, and formatting suggestions using AI.
list.impact: 1000+ users improved their resumes, 65% reported better interview rates

work-card-1.title: CSS-Tailwind converter
